Meet Our Team

The passionate individuals who bring Atlas Games to life through creativity, dedication, and a shared love for gaming.

Alex Chen

Lead Developer & Co-Founder

With over 8 years of experience in game development, Alex leads our technical vision and ensures our games push the boundaries of what's possible in indie gaming.

💼 🐦 ✉️

Maya Rodriguez

Creative Director & Co-Founder

Maya brings stories to life through compelling game design and artistic vision. Her background in narrative design ensures every Atlas game has heart and purpose.

💼 🐦 ✉️

Jordan Kim

Lead Artist

Jordan's artistic expertise spans from concept art to final polish. They create the visual worlds that make our games memorable and immersive experiences.

💼 🎮 ✉️

Sam Patel

Game Designer

Sam crafts the mechanics and systems that make our games fun and engaging. Their focus on player experience ensures every interaction feels meaningful.

💼 🐦 ✉️

Emma Thompson

Audio Designer

Emma creates the soundscapes that bring our games to life. From atmospheric music to satisfying sound effects, she ensures audio enhances every moment.

💼 🎵 ✉️

Chris Wilson

QA Lead

Chris ensures our games meet the highest quality standards. Their attention to detail and passion for polish helps us deliver bug-free, enjoyable experiences.

💼 🐦 ✉️
